text: Dimaadua ga helekai mai, “Hana labelaa, hagi anga ina do aloho gi di ahina dela e mouli huaidu be di manu ang gi ono ehoo daane. Goe gi aloho i mee, gadoo be dagu hai dela e aloho hua igolo i digau Israel, ma e aha maa digaula la guu huli gi nia balu ieidu mo di hiihai e tigidaumaha nia huwa laagau haga maangoo ‘raisin’ ang gi nia ada balu ieidu.”
